articles.title: Zachariah Shorty: FBI surge leads to charges in 2020 killing in Native American community - CNN
articles.description: Unconditional love. That’s what Vangie Randall-Shorty felt the moment she first held her son. She still feels it — even though Zachariah Shorty is now gone.
articles.content:
Bernalillo, New MexicoAP

Unconditional love. Thats what Vangie Randall-Shorty felt the moment she first held her son. She still feels it even though Zachariah Shorty is now gone.

articles.author: The Associated Press
articles.title: National Parks to raise fees by $100 for international tourists to popular U.S. parks - NPR
articles.description: The National Park Service says it is going to start charging international tourists an extra $100 to enter popular parks. They will be left out of fee-free days, reserved for American residents.
articles.content: WASHINGTON The National Park Service said Tuesday it is going to start charging the millions of international tourists who visit U.S. parks each year an extra $100 to enter some of the most popular s… [+2346 chars]
